title: The Benjamin's lamentation for their sad loss at sea, by storms and tempests Being a brief narrative of one of his Majesties ships, called the Benjamin, that was drove into harbour at Plimouth, and received small harm by this tempest. To a new tune, called, The poor Benjamin.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke,
notes: Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives range of dates: 1674-1679. Publication date from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
